user_input: I need to convert my demand timeseries in a format for the tst, please run the tst conversion file.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Run the TST conversion to export the demand time series in the required TST format.
tasks.entity_selection_context: No entity selection required; execute the TST conversion against the active demand time series per the user's request: '{user_input}'.
